project_overview.app_description: A full-stack AI + Blockchain platform providing smallholder farmers in Africa with instant microloans, tokenized carbon incentives, and a marketplace. Combines satellite/IoT/mobile data with explainable AI credit scoring and smart-contract lending.
project_overview.accessibility_standards: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with AAA targets for critical functions

technical_architecture.application_type: Progressive Web App (PWA) with SSR for critical pages and CSR for application shell

framework_selection.justification: Provides optimal blend of SSR for SEO/performance, static generation for marketing pages, client-side routing for app experience, and built-in PWA support. Strong TypeScript integration and ecosystem for our complex state management needs.

app_router_structure.layout_patterns: Root layout for global styles, nested layouts for dashboard/auth sections
app_router_structure.route_groups: (auth) for authentication pages, (dashboard) for protected routes
app_router_structure.server_components: Used for data-fetching heavy pages (marketplace, admin dashboard)
app_router_structure.client_components: Used for interactive features (loan application wizard, wallet connections)

framework_specific_patterns.api_routes: Next.js API routes for serverless functions handling webhook callbacks and proxy requests
framework_specific_patterns.middleware_usage: Authentication middleware for route protection, geolocation headers, A/B testing

user.profile: User object with wallet, DID, role
user.wallet_connection: Web3 provider state, chain ID, account

middlewares.purpose: Persist auth and user preferences across sessions

persistence_strategy.storage_engine: localStorage for basic persistence, IndexedDB for larger datasets
persistence_strategy.encryption: Encrypt sensitive auth data using CryptoJS before storage

cache_invalidation_strategy.optimistic_updates: Implemented for funding actions and repayments

prefetching.on_hover: Loan details on marketplace card hover

route_guards.implementation: Middleware function checking JWT and wallet connection

rtl_support.implementation: CSS logical properties, direction context provider

localized_formatting.currencies: cUSD, XOF, XAF, NGN, KES, GHS with local symbols

vendor_splitting.strategy: Next.js automatic vendor chunking with manual overrides

font_loading_strategy.font_display: swap for all, optional block for critical text

critical_css_extraction.strategy: Inline critical CSS for above-the-fold content

font_families.primary: 'Poppins', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif
